plays.text: Penalty to Stephane Richer 2 minutes for Boarding Eric Messier

Penalty to Kris Beech 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Alex Tanguay

Penalty to Kevin Stevens 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference TODD GILL
Penalty to Alex Tanguay 2 minutes for Obstruction - Interference Ian Moran
Penalty to Aleksey Morozov 2 minutes for Tripping Alex Tanguay
